```{r}
library(car)
```


```{r}
data = read.csv("BodyFat_Cleaned.csv")
model <- lm(BODYFAT ~ WEIGHT + ABDOMEN, data = data)
```



```{r}
plot(model, which = 1) 

plot(model, which = 2)
```
```{r}
vif_values <- vif(model)
vif_values
```
```{r}
barplot(vif_values, 
        main = "Variance Inflation Factor (VIF) Plot",
        ylab = "VIF",
        xlab = "Predictors",
        col = "lightblue",
        ylim = c(0, max(vif_values) + 1))

```
